message.name: ERR_TASKSEARCH_UNIMPLEMENTED
message.locale: No Task Search implemented. Please contact an Administrator.

message.name: ERR_ASSIGNEE_TYPE_MISMATCH
message.locale: The assignee type "%1c" does not correspond to the type of the selected assignee.

message.name: ERR_BUSINESS_OBJECT_TYPE_MISMATCH
message.locale: The business object type "%1c" does not correspond to the type of the selected business object.

message.name: ERR_DEADLINE_DUE_MUTUALLY_EXCLUSIVE
message.locale: The 'Due' field must be blank if either the 'From' or 'To' fields are filled.

message.name: ERR_CREATION_DATE_MUTUALLY_EXCLUSIVE
message.locale: The creation date 'From' and 'To' fields must be blank if either the 'Last Number of Days' or 'Last Number of Weeks' fields are filled.

message.name: ERR_CREATION_DATE_NUMBER_DAYS_AND_WEEKS_MUTUALLY_EXCLUSIVE
message.locale: The creation time last number of days field must be blank if the last number of weeks field is filled.

message.name: ERR_CREATION_FROM_BEFORE_CREATION_TO
message.locale: Creation from date must be before creation to date.

message.name: ERR_RESTART_FROM_BEFORE_RESTART_TO
message.locale: Restart date 'From' must be earlier than restart date 'To'.

message.name: ERR_DEADLINE_FROM_BEFORE_DEADLINE_TO
message.locale: Due date 'From' must be earlier than due date 'To'.

message.name: ERR_MINIMUM_CRITERIA_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: One of "From My Tasks Only" or "Assigned To" or "Business Object Type" must be selected.

message.name: ERR_USER_TASKS_ONLY_AND_ASSIGNEE_MUTUALLY_EXCLUSIVE
message.locale: Only one of "From My Tasks Only" or "Assigned To" can be selected.

message.name: INF_AVAILABLE_TASK_CRITERIA_WITH_ASSIGNED_ONLY
message.locale: Tasks assigned to %1s.

message.name: INF_AVAILABLE_TASK_CRITERIA_WITH_ASSIGNED_AND_ANY_DEADLINE
message.locale: Tasks assigned to %1s, due date.

message.name: INF_AVAILABLE_TASK_CRITERIA_WITH_ASSIGNED_AND_PRIORITY
message.locale: Tasks assigned to %1s, with a priority of %2s.

message.name: INF_AVAILABLE_TASK_CRITERIA_WITH_ASSIGNED_PRIORITY_AND_ANY_DEADLINE
message.locale: Tasks assigned to %1s, with a priority of %2s, with a due date.

message.name: INF_AVAILABLE_TASK_CRITERIA_WITH_ASSIGNED_AND_DEADLINE
message.locale: Tasks assigned to %1s, with a due date of %2s.

message.name: INF_AVAILABLE_TASK_CRITERIA_WITH_ASSIGNED_PRIORITY_AND_DEADLINE
message.locale: Tasks assigned to %1s, with a priority of %2s and a due date of %3s.

message.name: INF_AVAILABLE_TASK_CRITERIA_WITH_ASSIGNED_ANY_PRIORITY
message.locale: Tasks assigned to %1s, with any priority.

message.name: INF_AVAILABLE_TASK_CRITERIA_WITH_ASSIGNED_ANY_PRIORITY_AND_DEADLINE
message.locale: Tasks assigned to %1s, with any priority and a due date of %2s.

message.name: INF_AVAILABLE_TASK_CRITERIA_WITH_ASSIGNED_ANY_PRIORITY_AND_ANY_DEADLINE
message.locale: Tasks assigned to %1s, with any priority with a due date.
